page.title: 08Church and Nursery Schools
page.content:
{Archbishop Benson Church of England {School}is a voluntary aided school having 260 primary children. It has recently merged with the{St.Paul's {Infants School.}The school is working on a split site but building at Bodmin Road will start soon to accommodate the Infant Department.{ { {St.Mary's C.of E. School}at Higher Trehaverne is voluntary controlled and has 171 pupils.
In an adjacent property there is{Truro {Nursery School}having 51 children. Children below the age of 5 years are accepted into the school.
